title: Sri Lanka’s Multicultural Casualty – The National Anthem
content: By Shenali Waduge It is puzzling how an unreliable political ideology, advocated by liberals and subscribed to by a handful of academics, media personnel, government officials, social theorists. lefties and politicians have managed to take the world by storm introducing a concept called MULTICULTURALISM.
